result.execSummary:
The defendant Courtney A Nemitz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operate w/o Valid License(2nd w/in3 Yrs), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.05(3)(a).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

ADDRESS INFO for Courtney A Nemitz - per defendant
Current: 720 Cherry St Apt D, Oshkosh, WI 54901 United States  (Effective: 10-24-2016)
Prior: 1182 Old Knapp Road, Oshkosh, WI 54901 United States

10:08 a.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Joey Roeth.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Court recites agreement - defendant will plea to counts 1 and 2 with costs and DNA sample.  State concurs.  Statement by Atty Roeth - requests expungement on count 2.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1 & 2 as charged.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Sentencing statement by Atty Roeth.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to: 

COUNT 1

-Court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

COUNT 2

-Court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.
-Court will allow expungement after one year, if no further violations and all monies have been paid.

Court adjourned at 10:16 a.m.

11:29 a.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Joey Roeth present.  Andrew Christenson  for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Roeth - was just appointed on this case.  Court sets for Status Hearing on September 13, 2016 at 10:00 a.m.

Status hearing on August 1, 2016 at 11:30 am.

9:50 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Lisa Vanden Branden for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant - requests to obtain an attorney.  Court will set for Status Hearing on August 1, 2016 at 11:30 a.m. 

Court adjourned at 9:52 a.m.

11:10 a.m.  No Appearance by the defendant.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Court orders a warrant - stayed for ten days.

Court adjourned at 11:11 a.m.
Status hearing on July 5, 2016 at 10:30 am.

9:02 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his/her right to an attorney.  Defendant stands mute.  Court enters a plea of NOT GUILTY on behalf of the defendant.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond.  Court will set for Status Hearing on July 5, 2016 at 10:30 a.m.  Defendant to make appointment with the DA's office.

Court adjourned at 9:06 a.m.
**PROCESSING COMPLETE**
